rule_description: Ensure no values are NULL or missing.
Ensure values contain only numeric characters (0-9).
Ensure all values are consistent across the dataset and adhere to defined standards.
Ensure foreign keys correctly reference existing records in the related tables.
Ensure values are unique and distinct within the dataset.
Ensure values contain only decimal numbers (with optional decimal places).
Ensure Emirates ID contains 15 numeric characters, starting with "784" and pass Luhn Algorith Checks
Ensure date values are in the format yyyymmdd hh:mm:ss.SSS or yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss.SSS.
Ensure date values are in the format yyyymmdd or yyyy-mm-dd.
Ensure date values follow the format yyyy-mm-ddTHH:MM:SSZ or yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS.
Ensure values are alphanumeric, containing only letters and numbers.
Ensure values contain only English alphabet characters (A-Z).
Ensure values contain only Arabic characters.
Ensure values contain only "Male" or "Female".
Ensure values contain valid phone numbers, following predefined formats.
Ensure values contain valid email addresses following standard email formats (e.g., example@domain.com).
Ensure date values follow the format yyyy-mm-ddTHH:MM:SSZ or yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS,yyymmdd,yyyy-mm-dd
Ensure values contain only Valid Curriculum.
Ensure values contain only Valid Nationality.
Ensure values contain only Valid Marital.
Ensure values contain only Valid Grade.
